## parseDuration() function

### parseDuration() function

parseDuration parses duration string into datefns Duration object

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function parseDuration(duration: string): Duration;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { parseDuration } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  duration | <code>string</code> | string to convert. For example '2m', '5h 20s' |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Duration`
